EmailTemplate.name: Welcome Nurture 2018.4 - Technical - See Us at a Future Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Maybe you'd like to come see for yourself?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
At Pivotal, we love events! We hope you can join us at one of our roadshows <[[http://springonetour.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-technical-2018]]>, meetups, or local industry events <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-technical-2018]]>. Simply keep an eye on our events webpage <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-technical-2018]]> to see what’s coming to a city near you!
If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a hands on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-technical-2018]]> to begin a discussion.
And of course, please stay in touch with the Pivotal Team and join the conversation on our blogs <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-technical-2018]]>, podcasts <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-technical-2018]]>, and Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/Pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-technical-2018]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team © 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103.
